posts.title: Showcase
posts.author: demo
posts.content:
We're introducing a new format for WordPress exports: WXZ

Structure

A WXZ file is a ZIP file that contains JSON files in various directories. This is a departure from the previous XML based WXR format and was created to give more flexibility for exports. Specifically, it makes it possible to:

  • Allow plugins to store data in an export file and help restore the data upon import.
  • Bundle media files inside the export file.
  • Access specific items through the file structure.

New Uses

Representations

Different representations of the data are made possible via converters:

  • In the SQLite representation, you can run SQL queries to get your data. Maybe some day you'll be able to run WordPress directly off this file.
  • The Big JSON bundles all JSON data contained in the ZIP file into a single JSON file which allows to directly query the file with tools like jq or serve this web page.

Tooling

In order to test the viability of our new format, we created two important tools:

Converter

This allows you to convert your WXR files to WXZ.

Validator

Ensure that your WXZ file is valid.
